room_title: Escape room "Panic in the Bunker" by Port City Escape in Wilmington
room_description:
You survived a nuclear attack and the outside world is no longer habitable. Your bunker’s fusion reactor that has been keeping you alive is now failing. There is only one hour left until the power runs out you are no longer protected from the nuclear wasteland that is now your backyard. You’ll need to put your survival skills to the test by scavenging your dwelling and acquiring the tools necessary in order to repair your ailing reactor.

You’ve survived the apocalypse– but can you survive a failing bunker?
